column5: Haven't had much to contribute in the last few months seeing as how my ice fishing season has been quite   . so I thought I would share my newest addition to the arsenal that I have so patiently waited for since October   (Damn customs)...  My new Kingpin series 1 fully ported by KW Engineering     The action shot, LOL ... sorry the cabin fever is getting to me
looks cool, i see you matched the line backing to the inside of the reel....SLICK.. now go get some fish!

A great example of engineering, design and machining.  Like a Swiss watch, form follows function. I'm sure you will take good care of that fine jewel.  Congrats on the get.  If you have never played with a reel like that, you look at it sideways and it starts to spin, and it just keeps going.
maybe on a windy day
Hey buddy, looks sweet. Want to see it in action soon. Wonder what that reel is going to look like beside a steely in a pic.

That is a fine piece of....metal.  Beauty man, I have been waiting for this post for a long time!   I had a 13'  JC customs Rainshadow in the crosshairs today, but someone else pulled the trigger before me. I gotta match the new reel up with something longer than my 11' 6" and the Ocrapma Aventa just won't due

Thanks Bud ... Rainshadow , nice .... Keep looking and I am sure another will come up. I am just about ready to cut down my Ocrapa Aventa and use it for an ice rod  LOL ....  Hopefully the Loomis comes in the mail before this season gets goin full force.
Nice gear, but you can't beat a Daiwal Regal and an UgliStick.  $47.50, you're done.
Sorry Doug,  I thought you were well read?  CTC has that combo for sale at $23.25 right now.   Let's slay'em; they need to be slayed.
Nice!!!!
Nice reel bud! The spring season starts in earnest this week, stay in touch.
nice lookin pin JDMLS! can't wait to see all the steel that baby tames...good luck out there!   Hawk
Right on man!!  bet you can't wait to put it to good use Beautiful... congratulations Leechman
Snag, I could be persuaded to help whip the Toronto shoreline to a froth someday soon, a day or two's notice should do it.
Indeed I will
Hey Did you get it at JB's?  Jose
SWEET RIDE BRO!!! ENJOY!!!
yup
My turn to man the camera this time!!!!   Good job Dave!
If you catch anything with it, drop it off at the house and I'll tell you how it tasted  looks good!
Nice pin not bad for a WO......?
NICE Reel!  Bet you can't wait o use it!
